Description: Five people were shot and wounded outside of a nightclub around 6am local time.[316]

An argument at the Torrance bowling alley escalated into a fight and three people were killed by gunshots, at least four others were wounded. A suspect who was out of prison on parole has been arrested.[313]
A man injured four people in a shooting following an argument at a party. He was arrested the same day.[310]
An argument at a motel escalated into a shooting. One person was killed, and five others were injured.[309]

A man was killed and five other people were injured in a shooting. The Mayor of Jacksonville described the shooting as gang-related, although this characterization has been disputed by the sister of the deceased man.[306]

Location: Ascension Parish and Livingston Parish, Louisiana
Description: January 2019 Louisiana shootings: A 21-year-old man killed five people, including his parents, in two parishes in Louisiana.[294]The suspect fled to Virginia and was arrested the next day.[295]
Police responded to a call and discovered five people with gunshot wounds, along with two of the victims sustaining life-threatening injuries.[290]
